verses.verse: (Jer. 51:16) He destroyed the firstborn of Egypt, Both of man and beast.
(Ex. 12:12; Ps. 78:51) He sent signs and wonders into the midst of you, O Egypt, (Ex. 7:10; Deut. 6:22; Ps. 78:43) Upon Pharaoh and all his servants.
(Ps. 136:15) He defeated many nations And slew mighty kings—
Sihon king of the Amorites, Og king of Bashan, And (Num. 21:24; Ps. 136:17) all the kingdoms of Canaan—
(Josh. 12:7-24) And gave their land as a heritage, A heritage to Israel His people.
(Ps. 78:55; 136:21, 22) Your name, O LORD, endures forever, Your fame, O LORD, throughout all generations.
((Ex. 3:15; Ps. 102:12)) For the LORD will judge His people, And He will have compassion on His servants.
(Deut. 32:36) The idols of the nations are silver and gold, The work of men’s hands.
They have mouths, but they do not speak; Eyes they have, but they do not see;
They have ears, but they do not hear; Nor is there any breath in their mouths.
Those who make them are like them; So is everyone who trusts in them.
((Ps. 115:4-8)) Bless the LORD, O house of Israel! Bless the LORD, O house of Aaron!
Bless the LORD, O house of Levi! You who fear the LORD, bless the LORD!
Blessed be the LORD ((Ps. 115:9)) out of Zion, Who dwells in Jerusalem! Praise the LORD!
(Thanksgiving to God for His Enduring Mercy) Oh, (Ps. 134:3) give thanks to the LORD, for He is good! (Ps. 106:1) For His mercy endures forever.
Oh, give thanks to (1 Chr. 16:34; Jer. 33:11) the God of gods! For His mercy endures forever.
Oh, give thanks to the Lord of lords! For His mercy endures forever:
To Him ((Deut. 10:17)) who alone does great wonders, For His mercy endures forever;
(Deut. 6:22; Job 9:10; Ps. 72:18) To Him who by wisdom made the heavens, For His mercy endures forever;
(Gen. 1:1, 6-8; Prov. 3:19; Jer. 51:15) To Him who laid out the earth above the waters, For His mercy endures forever;
(Gen. 1:9; Ps. 24:2; (Is. 42:5); Jer. 10:12) To Him who made great lights, For His mercy endures forever—
(Gen. 1:14-18) The sun to rule by day, For His mercy endures forever;
The moon and stars to rule by night, For His mercy endures forever.
(Gen. 1:16) To Him who struck Egypt in their firstborn, For His mercy endures forever;
(Ex. 12:29; Ps. 135:8) And brought out Israel from among them, For His mercy endures forever;
(Ex. 12:51; 13:3, 16) With a strong hand, and with an outstretched arm, For His mercy endures forever;
